2.62.text:
Written in these walls are the stories that
I can’t explain... eh I mean

9.96.text:
whiteboard, and I’ll try to explain. Hey
guys, it’s me Harry Styles. This is the

15.76.text:
my life... by draw my life. I was born Harry
Edward Styles on the 1st of

20.78.text:
February 1994. I’m from Cheshire, England.
I’ve got one sister, Gemma, and one

26.76.text:
half brother, Mike. I’m not sure which half
of him I’m related to, but he’s a pretty

31.64.text:
bloke all round. My parents Anne and Des got
divorced when I was 7, which was

37.51.text:
sad... awww. But I was best man at my mum’s
wedding when she got remarried a

42.33.text:
few years later. I love my mum, I usually
call her 5 times a day. I once got drunk and

48.43.text:
accidentally called her thinking she was my
ex-girlfriend. I told her I loved her. Which

52.68.text:
she was pleased about. But she got confused
when I asked her what she was

57.43.text:
Before the X-Factor I was just a normal 16
year old kid. I was studying law, sociology

63.64.text:
and business at school. I also worked part
time in a bakery for some extra dough. I

69.00.text:
formed my own band with some friends from
school, I was the lead singer. We were

73.59.text:
called White Eskimo, people told us they really
liked our songs and that they were

78.09.text:
really inuit... get it? inuit… in to it…
that’s an eskimo pun. I auditioned for the

85.07.text:
X-Factor in 2010, I sang Stevie Wonder’s
Isn’t She Lovely acapella. Nicole cyborg

91.17.text:
said that I had a really nice voice for someone
so young. I told her she had really

95.19.text:
nice eyes for a robot. But Louis Walsh said
no, he said I lacked

100.12.text:
confidence and experience… and an identical
twin. Simon Cowell said

103.71.text:
that with some vocal training and a more heartbreaking
back-story I could go really

108.22.text: far. I clearly had the charisma.

110.42.text:
I didn’t make it to through to judge’s
houses though. I was eliminated at bootcamp

115.01.text:
after singing Stop Crying Your Heart Out by
Oasis, which was ironic because I did

119.94.text:
cry... a lot. Fortunately though Nicole from
the PussyCat Dolls knows that if

125.26.text:
you take some good looking people, put them
in a band together and make them

128.88.text:
dance you can build a career out of it. She
teamed up me, Niall, Louis, Zayn and

133.90.text:
Liam and we stayed in the competition to form
a boy band. We stayed at my dad’s

138.35.text:
house for the next week to get to know each
other and rehearse. That’s where I

142.32.text:
came up with the name One Direction, because
I thought it would sound good when

146.09.text:
the X-Factor announcer would say it each week
in his loud booming voice. And it did

150.63.text:
if you could hear it over all the screaming
girls. We came third in the

153.80.text:
competition, behind Matt Cardle and Rebecca
Ferguson. That result still makes me

158.38.text: upset to this day. Of course not.

161.77.text:
After X-Factor we made a deal with the devil,
eh, I mean Simon Cowell, and signed

165.96.text:
with his record label. Our first album Up
All Night featured songs written by Ed

169.81.text:
Sheeran and Kelly Clarkson. As well as our
mega hit What Makes You Beautiful

174.56.text:
where we sang about what made a girl so beautiful.
Maybe she’s born with it, maybe

179.23.text:
it’s Maybelline... maybe we shouldn’t
be speculating about hereditary

182.17.text:
diseases. When Up All Night reached number
one I celebrated by buying a new

185.80.text:
mattress... rock and roll! Our success only
grew and grew from there... so did my hair.

192.66.text:
We had sell out tours all over the world and
our first four albums all reached number

197.10.text:
one. But then the unthinkable happened: Zayn
left the band. It was

202.74.text:
crushing, I cried... again. An original member
leaving a boy band was just so

208.60.text:
unimaginable, nothing like that ever happened
to a boy band before, not Take That,

214.06.text:
not Westlife, not N-Sync, nobody! But we had
to keep going, we owed it to our fans.

221.04.text:
1D have the best fans ever, like the girl
who got a massive tattoo of my face, or the

227.59.text:
ones that send death threats to our girlfriends
or the fan who offered to let us stab

232.00.text:
her just so she could see us in court. I love
you all. You guys complete me!

236.53.text:
I got a reputation for being a bit of a ladies
man and a playboy over the years, which

240.84.text:
wasn’t fair really. Sure I’ve made mistakes,
but I was young ... even if

245.57.text:
Caroline Flack wasn’t. People thought it
was weird because she was 14 years older

249.51.text: than me. But I just kept telling them it wasn’t, because I wasn’t 14 anymore, I

253.95.text:
was 18. Then I dated sensitive songstress
Taylor Swift, people warned me that if it

259.08.text:
didn’t work out she would write a song about
me... they were right, I didn’t

263.87.text:
get Out Of The Woods on that one. That’s
why next I dated somebody who was out

268.14.text:
of the spotlight and didn’t crave media
attention: Kendall Jenner.

271.96.text:
I’ve written loads of One Direction’s
songs, as well as songs for Ariana Grande

276.77.text:
Gavin DeGraw. Which is why I’ve got a net
worth of 23 million dollars. Almost as

282.65.text:
much as my 25 million twitter followers. I
can juggle and play the kazoo,

288.33.text:
but not at the same time. I’m the youngest
member of 1D. I support Manchester

292.72.text:
United. I tell people my favourite movie is
Fight Club, but it’s really Love Actually.

298.23.text:
had a pet hamster called Hamster. My right
leg is half an inch shorter than my left,

302.69.text:
which is why I can’t walk in a straight
line. I really like tattoos and puns,

307.79.text:
I’ve got tattoos of a heart on my sleeve,
butterflies on my stomach, a cage around my

312.74.text:
ribs and a cross on my heart. I’ve always
had good pundamentals like that! And I’ve

317.48.text:
got four nipples, which is twice as many as
my friend Zayn whose Draw My Life you

321.29.text:
can also watch by clicking here. Quitter!
Just kidding Zayn. Thanks guys,
